Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, =
2000 4:39 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "It's up to you where we sta=
rt." Deemos said to Wrath...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: il=
ovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 200=
0 4:27 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Wrath nods and smiles* Wra=
th: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
   "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come."=
 Inzola said.

      "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos sa=
id. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

      "Those Alliance and Preds will =
be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

=
      "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few stand out, y=
ou are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
        ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


        *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm.=
...I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzo=
la*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
      =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM=

          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Inzola smiles and shakes=
 Wrath's hand.

          "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot up=
on my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds an=
d then looked back to Wrath.

          "So, what are we supposed to do rig=
ht now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
          From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


            Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that D=
eemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a ha=
nd shake*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: T=
HECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday,=
 July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
              Subject: Neo Beast Wars


           =
   Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and look=
ed around.

              "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola s=
aid. Deemos laughed.

              "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

   =
           Gangon's spark is still waiting.

              Artist runs arou=
nd in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs=
 away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain an=
d an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his=
 mind. Hours later, he awakes.

              "Oh, that was some blow, but =
I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

              "Plintissa? Where are y=
ou my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered tha=
t she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran =
to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

              "Plintissa =
dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa=
 looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they ki=
ssed. After the kiss.

              "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhy=
mes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

              "Okay, I won't rhyme, =
we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist to=
ok Plintissa to a grassy plain.

              Dracona held up her scanning=
 device in front of Scorponok's face.

              "I can find that devic=
e I lost." Dracona said.

              "Then I'll give it to the Predacons=
, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked a=
t Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mo=
uths agape.

              The Radicons sat there still...

---------------=
